ConfigItem.Name: ProductName
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the name of the application, shown in the web interface, tabs and title bar of the web browser.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketOwner###NoteMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::AgentTicketResponsible###NoteMandatory
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if note must be filled in by the agent. Can be overwritten by Ticket::Frontend::NeedAccountedTime.

ConfigItem.Name: TimelineViewEnabled
ConfigItem.Description: Enables the timeline view in AgentTicketZoom.

ConfigItem.Name: Loader::Agent::CommonJS###100-OTRSBusiness
ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Loader::Customer::CommonJS###100-OTRSBusiness
ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Active
ConfigItem.Description: Activates chat support.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatDirection::PublicToAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Makes it possible to start a chat with an agent from the public interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatDirection::CustomerToAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Makes it possible to start a chat with an agent from the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatDirection::AgentToCustomer
ConfigItem.Description: Makes it possible to start a chat with a customer from the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatDirection::AgentToAgent
ConfigItem.Description: Makes it possible to start a chat with an agent from the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::PermissionGroup::ChatReceivingAgents
ConfigItem.Description: Agent group that can accept chat requests and chat.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::PermissionGroup::ChatStartingAgents
ConfigItem.Description: Agent group that can create chat requests.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::PermissionGroup::VideoChatAgents
ConfigItem.Description: Agent group that can use video calling feature in chats.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerChat
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerFrontend::NavBarModule###000-CustomerChat
ConfigItem.Description: Customer frontend module registration (disable chat link if chat feature is inactive or no agents are available for chat).

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentChat
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NavBarModule###000-CustomerChat
ConfigItem.Description: Agent frontend module registration (disable chat link if chat feature is inactive or agent is not in chat group).

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###12-ChatRequests
ConfigItem.Description: Agent interface notification module to check for open chat requests.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###13-ChatAvailability
ConfigItem.Description: Agent interface availability.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentChatAppend
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: PublicFrontend::Module###PublicChat
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the public interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::DefaultAgentName
ConfigItem.Description: Default agent name for customer and public interface. If enabled, the real name of the agent will not be visible to customers/public users while using the chat.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::DefaultAgentNameNumbers
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if numbers should be appended to DefaultAgentName. If enabled, together with DefaultAgentName will be numbers (e.g. 1,2,3,...).

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::PublicInterface::AllowChatChannels
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if public users are able to select Chat Channel. If not, chat will be created in default Chat Channel.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::CustomerInterface::AllowChatChannels
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if customer users are able to select Chat Channel. If not, chat will be created in default Chat Channel.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::CustomerFrontend::AvailabilityCheck
ConfigItem.Description: Allow customer to select only channels that have available agent(s).

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::PublicInterface::AvailabilityCheck
ConfigItem.Description: Allow public users to select only channels that have available agent(s).

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::CustomerThreshold
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the period of time (in minutes) before No Answer message is displayed to the customer.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::CustomerFrontend::NoAgentsAvailable::NewTicket
ConfigItem.Description: No agents available message.

Setting.String: There are no chat agents available at present. To create a new ticket, please click here:

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::CustomerFrontend::NoAgentsAvailable::AddToExisiting
ConfigItem.Description: No agents available message.

Setting.String: There are no chat agents available at present. To add an article to the existing ticket, please click here:

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::CustomerFrontend::NotYetAccepted
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the customer interface.

Setting.String: Please bear with us until one of our agents is able to handle your chat request. Thank you for your patience.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::CustomerFrontend::ChatClosed
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the customer interface.

Setting.String: This chat has ended. Please leave it or it will be closed automatically. You can download this chat.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::PublicInterface::ChatClosed
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the public interface.

Setting.String: This chat has ended. Please leave it or it will be closed automatically.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::CustomerFrontend::ChatCompleted
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the customer interface.

Setting.String: This chat is completed. You can now close the chat window.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::PublicFrontend::NoAgentsAvailable
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the public interface.

Setting.String: There are no chat agents available at present. Please try again later.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::PublicFrontend::NotYetAccepted
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the public interface.

Setting.String: Please bear with us until one of our agents is able to handle your chat request. Thank you for your patience.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::Texts::PublicFrontend::ChatCompleted
ConfigItem.Description: Default text for the public interface.

Setting.String: This chat is completed. You can start a new chat using the button on top of this page.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AdminChatChannel
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###CustomChatChannelExternal
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the ChatChannel object in the preference view of the agent interface.

Hash.Item: Your selection of your preferred external chat channels. You will be notified about external chat requests in these chat channels.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Customer::StartChatFromTicket###Allowed
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if a chat request can be sent out from customer ticket zoom view.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::StartChatFromTicket###Allowed
ConfigItem.Description: Sets if a chat request can be sent out from agent ticket zoom view.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Customer::StartChatFromTicket###Permissions
ConfigItem.Description: If this flag is set to Yes, only the ticket customer can start a chat from a ticket zoom view.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::StartChatFromTicket###PermissionLevel
ConfigItem.Description: Permission level to start a chat with customer from agent ticket zoom view.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::StartChatFromTicket###RequiredLock
ConfigItem.Description: Defines if locking a ticket is required to start a chat with the customer from the ticket zoom view.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Customer::StartChatFromTicket###AllowChatOnlyIfAgentsAvailable
ConfigItem.Description: If this flag is set to Yes, starting a chat from customer ticket zoom view will only be possible, if there are available agents in the linked chat channel.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::StartChatFromTicket###AllowChatOnlyIfCustomerAvailable
ConfigItem.Description: If this flag is set to Yes, starting a chat from agent ticket zoom view will only be possible, if the ticket customer is online.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentChatPreview
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: QueuePreferences###ChatChannel
ConfigItem.Description: Chat channel to queue mapping.

Hash.Item: Chat channel that will be used for communication related to the tickets in this queue.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentChatDownload
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerChatDownload
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the customer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentChatPopup
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::AgentOnlineThreshold
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the period of time (in minutes) before agent is marked as "away" due to inactivity.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::CustomerOnlineThreshold
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the period of time (in minutes) before customer is marked as "away" due to inactivity.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::DefaultChatChannel
ConfigItem.Description: Name of default chat channel. If this channel does not exist, it will be created automatically. Please do not create a chat channel with the same name as default chat channel. The default channel won't be displayed, if chat channels are enabled in Customer interface and Public interface. All agent to agent chats will be in the default channel.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::StartChatWOTicket
ConfigItem.Description: If this flag is set to Yes, agents can start a chat with a customer without a ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Customer::StartChatWOTicket
ConfigItem.Description: If this flag is set to Yes, customers can start a chat with an agent without a ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentChatAvailability
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::UnavailableForExternalChatsOnLogin
ConfigItem.Description: If enabled it will check agents availability on login. If user is available for external chats, it will reduce availability to internal chats only.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NotifyModule###513-ChatAvailability-Check
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the module to display a notification in the agent interface, if the agent is not available for chat with customers (only if Ticket::Agent::AvailableForChatsAfterLogin is set to No).

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::NotifyModule###523-ChatPreferredChannels-Check
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the module to display a notification in the agent interface, if the agent is available for external chats, but forgot to set preferred channel(s).

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Agent::DisplayNotificationIfUnavailable
ConfigItem.Description: If this flag is set to Yes, a notification will be displayed on each page if the current agent is not available for chat.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatTTL
ConfigItem.Description: Number of hours after closed chat will be deleted.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatDecayTime
ConfigItem.Description: Number of days after chat will be deleted.

ConfigItem.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###RemoveClosedChats
ConfigItem.Description: Remove closed chats older than ChatEngine::ChatTTL.

ConfigItem.Name: Daemon::SchedulerCronTaskManager::Task###RemoveOldChats
ConfigItem.Description: Remove old chats.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::CustomerFrontend::AgentPreferencesText
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a text for Agent Preferences in the Customer interface (works only if DefaultAgentName is disabled).

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::CustomerFrontend::AgentPreferences
ConfigItem.Description: Defines a list of agent preferences group keys that will be visible in Customer interface (works only if DefaultAgentName is disabled). Example: If you want to display PreferencesGroups###Language, add Language.

ConfigItem.Name: ChatEngine::ChatOrder
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the order of chat windows.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentVideoChat
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: CustomerFrontend::Module###CustomerVideoChat
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the cusotmer interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentTicketAttachmentView
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Ticket::Frontend::MenuModule###420-Attachments
ConfigItem.Description: Shows all attachments available in the ticket.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLogoCustom###business
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the agent interface for the skin "business". See "AgentLogo" for further description.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLogoCustom###default
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the agent interface for the skin "default". See "AgentLogo" for further description.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLogoCustom###slim
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the agent interface for the skin "slim". See "AgentLogo" for further description.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLogoCustom###ivory
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the agent interface for the skin "ivory". See "AgentLogo" for further description.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLogoCustom###ivory-slim
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown in the header of the agent interface for the skin "ivory-slim". See "AgentLogo" for further description.

ConfigItem.Name: AgentLoginLogo
ConfigItem.Description: The logo shown on top of the login box of the agent interface. The URL to the image must be relative URL to the skin image directory.

ConfigItem.Name: Loader::Agent::Skin###002-business
ConfigItem.Description: Default skin for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Loader::Agent::DefaultSelectedSkin
ConfigItem.Description: The agent skin's InternalName which should be used in the agent interface. Please check the available skins in Frontend::Agent::Skins.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Template::GenerateBlockHooks###100-OTRSBusiness-ContactWithData
ConfigItem.Description: Generate HTML comment hooks for the specified blocks so that filters can use them.

ConfigItem.Name: DynamicFields::Driver###ContactWithData
ConfigItem.Description: DynamicField backend registration.

FrontendModuleReg.Title: Dynamic Fields Contact Data Backend GUI

ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterPostContactWithData
ConfigItem.Description: Output filter for standard tt files.

ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: AdminContactWithData::RunInitialWildcardSearch
ConfigItem.Description: Runs an initial wildcard search of the existing contacts with data when accessing the AdminContactWithData module.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterPostSLASelectionDialog
ConfigItem.Description: Output filter to inject the necessary JavaScript into the views.

ConfigItem.Name: SLAPreferences###FieldSelectionDialogText
ConfigItem.Description: Text which is being displayed on selection of this SLA on CustomerTicketMessage.

Hash.Item: Is being displayed if a customer chooses this SLA on ticket creation.

ConfigItem.Description: List of JS files to always be loaded for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Output::FilterElementPost###OutputFilterPostAddDynamicFieldNames
ConfigItem.Description: Output filter to inject the necessary Dynamic field names in hidden input.

ConfigItem.Name: Notification::Transport::NotificationView::DaysToKeep
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the number of days a notification should be still shown in the notification web view screen (value of '0' means always show).

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::ToolBarModule###12-NotificationWebView::AgentNotificationView
ConfigItem.Description: Tool-bar item for a notification web view.

ConfigItem.Name: Frontend::Module###AgentNotificationView
ConfigItem.Description: Frontend module registration for the agent interface.

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::Frontend::AgentNotificationView###DefaultColumns
ConfigItem.Description: Columns that can be filtered in the notification web view of the agent interface. Possible settings: 0 = Disabled, 1 = Available, 2 = Enabled by default.

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::Frontend::Overview###Small
ConfigItem.Description: Allows having a small format notification web view.

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###NotificationViewSmallPageShown
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for the pages (in which the notifications are shown) of the small notifications view.

Hash.Item: Notification limit per page for Notification web view "Small"

ConfigItem.Name: PreferencesGroups###NotificationViewFilterSettings
ConfigItem.Description: Parameters for notification web view filters.

Hash.Item: Column notification web view filters for Notification web view type "Small".

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::Frontend::BulkFeature
ConfigItem.Description: Enables notification web view bulk action feature for the agent frontend to work on more than one notification at a time.

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::Frontend::BulkFeatureGroup
ConfigItem.Description: Enables notification web view bulk action feature only for the listed groups.

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::ObjectType###Ticket
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the settings for ticket notification.

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::ObjectType###Appointment
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the settings for appointment notification.

ConfigItem.Name: NotificationView::ObjectType###Calendar
ConfigItem.Description: Defines the settings for calendar notification.

ConfigItem.Description: Cleans up old chat logs.

ConfigItem.Description: Defines the path to the PhantomJS binary. You can use a static build from http://phantomjs.org/download.html for an easy installation process.
